objects.description: [Mustang Panda](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0129) has obtained and leveraged publicly-available tools for intrusion activities.(Citation: Cisco Talos MUSTANG PANDA PLUGX PUBLOAD MAY 2022)(Citation: Palo Alto Unit42 STATELY TAURUS TONESHELL September 2023)
